text: Stephen Lushington may refer to: * Sir Stephen Lushington, 1st Baronet (1744–1807), MP, Chairman of the British East India Company * Stephen Lushington (judge) (1782–1873), MP, leading advocate of the abolition of slavery and Judge of the Admiralty Court * Stephen Lushington (Royal Navy officer) (1803–1877), commander of the British naval brigade at Sebastopol in 1854 * Stephen Rumbold Lushington (1776–1868), MP, Governor of Madras 1827–1835
title: Stephen Lushington
